knimeNode.name: R to Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts an R object into a KNIME data table.

fullDescription.intro:
Converts a data frame from an R workspace into a KNIME data table. The result data is returned at the data out-port.
Please, use the variable name knime.out for the data frame.
More details about R:
http://www.r-project.org/
Short-refcard.pdf

option.p: The R commands to run. The data frame that should appear at the output is expected to be stored in knime.out.

option.name: Category - Title
option.p: A categorized list of R script templates. The apply button at the left will replace the R script and guide you to the R Snippet tab.
Please use "Create Template..." button on the R Snippet tab to add the current R script to the list of templates.

tab.name: Advanced
tab.option: Convert NaN and +/-Infinity output to missing cells. Enable this for backwards compatibility with the behavior before version 2.10.

option.name: Overwrite default path to R home

tab.option: Check this option to select a path to the home of a R installation that is different from the path configured on the R preference page. The path must point to the root folder of the R installation tree. You can either specify the path directly or use the R installation in a conda environment. The conda environment can be specified using a conda environment flow variable from e.g. a “Conda Environment Propagation” node.
